methods.name: toggleFullscreen
methods.description: Toggle the view to be fullscreen or not fullscreen
methods.description_zh: 将视图切换为全屏或不全屏

methods.name: runCmd
methods.description: Run contentEditable command at caret position and range
methods.description_zh: 在插入符号位置和范围运行 contentEditable 命令
methods.params: (cmd: String, param: String, update: Boolean) => void

methods.name: refreshToolbar
methods.description: Hide the link editor if visible and force the instance to re-render
methods.description_zh: 隐藏链接编辑器（如果可见）并强制实例重新渲染

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus on the contentEditable at saved cursor position
methods.description_zh: 将焦点放在保存的光标位置的 contentEditable 上

methods.name: getContentEl
methods.description: Retrieve the content of the Editor

events.name: update:fullscreen
events.description: Used by Vue on 'v-model:fullscreen' prop for updating its value
events.description_zh: 被 Vue 在 'v-model：fullscreen' prop 上使用，以更新其值

events.name: dropdown-show
events.description: Emitted after a dropdown in the toolbar has triggered show()
events.description_zh: 在工具栏中的下拉列表触发 show（） 后发出

events.name: dropdown-before-show
events.description: Emitted when a dropdown in the toolbar triggers show() but before it finishes doing it
events.description_zh: 当工具栏中的下拉列表触发 show（） 但在完成之前触发

events.name: dropdown-hide
events.description: Emitted after a dropdown in the toolbar has triggered hide()
events.description_zh: 在工具栏中的下拉列表触发 hide（） 后发出

events.name: dropdown-before-hide
events.description: Emitted when a dropdown in the toolbar triggers hide() but before it finishes doing it
events.description_zh: 当工具栏中的下拉列表触发 hide（） 但在完成之前触发

events.name: link-show
events.description: Emitted when the toolbar for editing a link is shown
events.description_zh: 显示用于编辑链接的工具栏时发出

events.name: link-hide
events.description: Emitted when the toolbar for editing a link is hidden
events.description_zh: 隐藏用于编辑链接的工具栏时发出

no-route-fullscreen-exit.description: Changing route app won't exit fullscreen
no-route-fullscreen-exit.description_zh: 更改路线应用程序不会全屏退出

model-value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

dense.desc: Dense mode; toolbar buttons are shown on one-line only

min-height.description: CSS unit for the minimum height of the editable area
min-height.description_zh: 可编辑区域最小高度的 CSS 单位

max-height.description: CSS unit for maximum height of the input area
max-height.description_zh: 用于输入区域最大高度的 CSS 单位

height.description: CSS value to set the height of the editable area
height.description_zh: 用于设置可编辑区域高度的 CSS 值

definitions.description: Definition of commands and their buttons to be included in the 'toolbar' prop
definitions.description_zh: 要包含在 'toolbar' 属性中的命令及其按钮的定义

toolbar.description: An array of arrays of Objects/Strings that you use to define the construction of the elements and commands available in the toolbar
toolbar.description_zh: 一个 Objects/String 数组数组，用于定义工具栏中可用的元素和命令的构造

toolbar-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
toolbar-color.desc: Font color (from the Quasar Palette) of buttons and text in the toolbar
toolbar-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

toolbar-text-color.desc: Text color (from the Quasar Palette) of toolbar commands

toolbar-toggle-color.description: Choose the active color (from the Quasar Palette) of toolbar commands button
toolbar-toggle-color.description_zh: 选择工具栏命令按钮的活动颜色（从 Quasar 调色板中）

toolbar-bg.description_zh: 工具栏背景颜色（来自 Quasar 调色板）

toolbar-outline.description_zh: 工具栏按钮呈现为“轮廓”

toolbar-push.description: Toolbar buttons are rendered as a "push-button" type
toolbar-push.description_zh: 工具栏按钮呈现为“按钮”类型

toolbar-rounded.description_zh: 工具栏按钮呈现为“圆角”

content-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for styling the container of QEditor
content-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于为 QEditor 的容器设置样式

content-class.description: CSS classes for the input area
content-class.description_zh: 输入区域的 CSS 类

placeholder.description_zh: 要显示为占位符的文本

slots.name: [command]
slots.description: Content for the given command in the toolbar
slots.description_zh: 工具栏中给定命令的内容
